attributes.additional_details:
IN ORDER FOR US TO BE FULLY HEARD IN REGARDS TO GAINING JUSTICE FOR MARK DUGGAN HAVING BIN TO THE HOUSES OF PARLIMENT ASKING/DEMANDING THAT THE CASE BE TAKEN OVER AND LOOKED AT MORE INTENSELY BY A HIGHER POWER .... BECAUSE THERE ARE SOME THINGS YOU CAN NOT JUS PUSH UNDER THE CARPET..

WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU TO BE HEARD IS YOUR SIGNATURES

rejection.details: Thank you for submitting this e-petition. The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy, not about individual cases.  So, unfortunately, we are unable to publish this particular one.
